text: Super Kirby Clash is a video game for the Nintendo Switch. It was made by HAL Laboratory and Vanpool and it released in 2019. ==Gameplay== Kirby has limited time to kill the bad guy he is fighting. There are many bad guys to kill, and Kirby can fight in 1 of 4 ways. There can be 4 or less Kirbys fighting a bad guy at one time. ==Story== Bad guys attack the town. Kirby and his friends must kill them. One of the bad guys is named Parallel Nightmare. He is the main bad guy. title: Super Kirby Clash
